title: Bug 114905 - Default value lost after modifying in list box of report parameter
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When setting a default value in the list box of a report parameter and then modifying the default value, the originally set default value is lost.
EB: The default value should stay intact even after modifying it in the list box of the report parameter.
SR: Steps to Reproduce: 1. Set a default value in the list box of a report parameter. 2. Modify the default value. 3. Observe that the originally set default value is lost.
